articles.title: Tampa Bay Lightning's Ondrej Palat plays hero again in Game 5 win over Colorado Avalanche
articles.description: Tampa Bay Lightning star Ondrej Palat came through in the clutch once again, scoring the game-winning goal in the third period of Game 5 on Friday night to keep the Lightning's title hopes alive.
articles.content:
DENVER -- If the Tampa Bay Lightning need a clutch goal in the third period during the Stanley Cup Playoffs, Ondrej Palat is the one scoring it.
